name: Prince Billy Bob: Clicker
description:
A middle-aged jobless Billy Bob! Decided to be a hero!!
It was a sunny day, a middle-aged jobless Billy Bob decided to be a hero after finding out that he couldn't take off the helmet put on just for fun.
Billy Bob found a dungeon just at the moment and all the monsters are hibernating!! Lucky~!
Enjoy the world's easiest and simplest automatic RPG
Featurs:
-All automatic battle! It's an easy RPG you just simply watch Billy Bob's battle and upgrade him.
-Billy bob never stops joking!
-Cute and high quality of the pixel design!
-Boss battle with a huge Dragon on every 100th stages!
-Just try it! I'm sure you will be addicted to this!
Please contact help_global@mafgames.com if you have any question or suggestion.
We will give our best effort to answer as soon as possible.
